name: Pocket Combat
description:
Pocket Combat - a full sized battlefield squeezed into a tiny package. Now with MissionBuilder! and even more weapons. Create your own war game and share it with friends, or the world! Over 590 missions online and ready to download for FREE!

Peace talks have broken down. Your little country has been invaded. You have the troops, you have the weapons: all that remains is for a commander to step forward and lead the way to victory.

Control 1000s of ground troops with a swipe of your finger. Lead them over beautiful terrain into pitch battles with the enemy, around natural barriers or even into tactical retreat.

Deploy brute force and advanced weapons to tackle the enemy invasion and bring peace back to your tiny country.

Each mission brings new challenges - speedy reactions, thoughtful problem solving, military tactics and aggression are all needed to be victorious. Have you got what it takes? Your tiny country needs you!

NOW WITH MISSION BUILDER! Create and share your own missions by email, Facebook, Twitter or via the web site!

And new weapons! Air, sea and land battles!

International Game Center leaderboards!

***
Wind down from a hard day with some carpet bombing and machine gun action!

This iPhone & iPad friendly game is the perfect antidote to your peaceful existence. Sometimes you just want to bomb the heck out of some bad guys.
***

12 free missions and 20 paid missions of country-saving battlefield action.

Send in 100s of troops, bombers, choppers, tanks and much more. Save civilians, break Delta team out of prison, survive against impossible odds.

Training built-in. Gets you causing maximum destruction in minutes. Build up to 3-Star General rank with extra challenges.

Even play with your own soundtrack - with or without the sound of 100s of explosions and marching troops!

And now Mission Builder!
***
